overview: This is the journey and testimony of nine American basketball players who currently plays professionally overseas. It's a story that has been lived by many but never been told. This documentary will explore the ins and outs of this truly unique situation that many are unable to grasp. Some do it for the money, while others do it for the love of the game. For all, if they're lucky, the European experience will be the ultimate reward.
title: Basketball Jones: The Overseas Journey
